timeline.bodyText: Was this change for testing? I'm asking since some issues does not appear with very low partition counts.
timeline.author: mdogan

timeline.bodyText: minor: you can probably use PartitionIdSet instead of BitSet here. It is backed by a BitSet while providing a Set<Integer> interface as well as methods with primitive int arguments to avoid unnecessary boxing/unboxing.
timeline.author: vbekiaris

replies.bodyText: BitSet is given to nodeEngine.getOperationService().executeOnPartitions. This is the reason i kept it as is.
replies.author: ahmetmircik

timeline.bodyText: Here if partitionId is not null and we reach numInOneGo, then that partitionId is lost from this batch because it was already removed from the queue.
timeline.author: vbekiaris

replies.bodyText: Good catch, now it should be fixed.
